column4: hi. i have a problem with synaptic. the repositories just wont load
have you verified your /etc/apt/sources.list?
i cant see any problem with sources.list
which repositories are giving you trouble?
all of them
when you run sudo apt-get update, what happens?
i havent tried that yet
that command checks allthe respositores for updatesed information and caches package information on your computer
E: Could not get lock /var/lib/apt/lists/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavailable)
is /var mounted?  did you use sudo?
yes i used sudo. let me try again
it sounds like another update program is running
are you running X?
yes. should i restart it?
no I just wanted to verify your environment
do you know the specific entries i should make in sources.list
can you list the lock file?  ls -l  /var/lib/apt/lists/lock
can you PM me your /etc/apt/sources.list?
ok
along with the output of uname -r and cat /etc/issue
for some reason apt-get is working now
however its getting to a point then stalling
I'm glad to hear that.  Perhaps another update process was already running?
stalling?  or downloading?
